channel.title: Sports,Football on NewsStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Sports,Football on NewsStreet

item.title: Brazil names Brazilian footballer Dani Alves in World Cup squad for FIFA World Cup in Qatar
item.description: Brazil names Brazilian footballer Dani Alves in World Cup squad for FIFA World Cup in Qatar Alves will be the oldest player to represent Brazil at the World Cup, eclipsing Djalma Santos, who was 37 when he formed part of the Selecao squad

item.title: Football Club (FC) Barcelona follow Real Madrid, Atletico Madrid beat Betis
item.description: Football Club (FC) Barcelona follow Real Madrid, Atletico Madrid beat Betis Herrera’s replacement Dani Garcia also had to go off injured in what was a relatively tepid second half which saw Ferran Torres score Barca’s fourth.

item.title: Sergi Roberto has dislocated shoulder, confirms Barcelona FC
item.description: Sergi Roberto has dislocated shoulder, confirms Barcelona FC Barcelona FC on Monday confirmed that Sergi Roberto has dislocated his left shoulder and faces another spell on the sidelines.
